markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fledgling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2649) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 136 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per round

</column>

---

You can fly through the air in short bursts. You Fly. If you don't normally have a fly Speed, you gain a fly Speed of 15 feet for this movement. If you aren't on solid ground at the end of this movement, you fall.

<title level="2">Fledgling Flight leads to...</title>
[Juvenile Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2653)
name: Fledgling Flight
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 136 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per round

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You can fly through the air in short bursts at half your land Speed.
</summary>
summary: You can fly through the air in short bursts at half your land Speed.
summary_markdown: You can fly through the air in short bursts at half your land Speed.
